{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4224833,"totalDownVotes":772763,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":303918,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🥚 Easter update! 🥚

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1125345,"totalDownVotes":119746,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":349928,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":612339,"totalDownVotes":47034,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":72669,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":269339,"totalDownVotes":33387,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":31282,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3768540,"totalDownVotes":310602,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":66328,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":527078,"totalDownVotes":37009,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":35135,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2772183,"totalDownVotes":363300,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":33222,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1019928,"totalDownVotes":51289,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":31385,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3227318,"totalDownVotes":282591,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":41958,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. 🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1418561,"totalDownVotes":118944,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":30540,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Construis ton bateau et vogue pour l'aventure!

--- +4 Barils de TNT!
--- 300% plus de vie!
--- 25% plus d'or!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2134352,"totalDownVotes":657735,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":51541,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2195020,"totalDownVotes":300411,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":54771,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙 Игра, которая бередит воображение! Беседуй, играй в игры, зарабатывай монеты и обустраивай собственный дом! 💙 

✨ Мы постоянно работаем над обновлениями! 

💙 Играй в «Мип-Сити» с миллионами других игроков!"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1188530,"totalDownVotes":67871,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":20821,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":141873,"totalDownVotes":7843,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":10722,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":696335,"totalDownVotes":94488,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":18794,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money
⚔️ Loot monsters and bosses
👨‍🍳 Cook tasty delicacies
🔥 And more!

Controls:
[E]: Open inventory

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":911086,"totalDownVotes":118642,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🏆UPDATE + SALE🏆] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":14162,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 75 🚨
🏆 New Bubble Pass for season 20!
💪 Competitive leaderboards are back!
🥚 New egg in the Shadow Realm (Corrupted Egg)
🐶 16 new pets!
🔥 ??
💰 60% off sale on all gamepasses!
💸 50% off sale on all boosts!
🐰 Easter event has ended! We hope you enjoyed our biggest egg hunt yet
🎮 Bug fixes for gamepad auto-hatch.

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":661320,"totalDownVotes":128235,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":8173,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":186726,"totalDownVotes":30694,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":7749,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Los beta testers obtienen el DLC de One Piece de manera gratuita.

Controles:
Shift: Correr
Q: Esquivar
F: Bloquear
Ataques Básicos: Mouse1
Espacio+Mouse1: Ataques Aéreos
Combina Ataques Básicos y Ataques Aéreos para descubrir nuevos combos.
Usa 1,2,3,4 para los movimientos especiales de tu personaje.
Transformación: G

Scripters: Snakeworl, jjjakey, Melon_Sensei
Constructores: Chicken_Man
Contribuidores: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2323218,"totalDownVotes":244121,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":35356,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1795334,"totalDownVotes":140116,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7014,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":514604,"totalDownVotes":42321,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":12308,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! If you're feeling up for a challenge, try taking on harder bosses on harder difficulties!

👥💵 Join the group for +$100 starting cash! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Thumbs up and favorite for more quality updates!🌟

🔨UPDATES🔨
+ 🎃 HALLOWEEN PART 2
+ 👻 MORE GHOST SKINS
+ 📦 DEMON SKINS
+ 🍂 MORE SEASON RANKS
+ 🛠️ BUG FIXES + CHANGES

Read full update log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tds-halloween-part-2-update-log/886047

✨Lead Dev/Design: BelowNatural
📜Scripter: Razuatix
🎹Music Composer: Phoqus
🔊SFX Designer: BiddinUp
🖼️GFX Designer: Jaaziar

🏆 8th Annual Bloxy Award Winner
Google "TDS Wiki" to visit our for in-depth game info!"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":268966,"totalDownVotes":141809,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":13867,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":6465898,"creatorName":"Last EXE","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":11393,"totalDownVotes":2289,"universeId":2340432463,"name":"[New Event!!] Last Pirates","placeId":6329844902,"playerCount":10301,"imageToken":"T_6329844902_7145","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Current Level cap : 600
Current Fruit : Tori,Yami,Pika,Mera,Moku,Suna,Suke,Guru,Yomi,Bomu,Hie,Magu,Zushi,Gura,Soru,Bisu,Bari

Devil fruit spawn every 30 mins and respawn every 10 mins

Control
Q - Dash
Ctrl - Sprint/Run
Double spacebar - Geppo
F- Flash Step
J - Armament"},{"creatorId":3642592,"creatorName":"Schwifty Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1279878,"totalDownVotes":276197,"universeId":498490399,"name":"Mad City","placeId":1224212277,"playerCount":8997,"imageToken":"T_1224212277_2d87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The boss and gift event has ended! Congratulations to the people who won the rewards!

Welcome to Mad City, where the choice is yours to choose the power of good or evil. Cause chaos in the city streets as a criminal and super villain or join the super heroes and police force to bring justice to the city. With so many heists, the chaos never stops!

Follow the developers on twitter for updates and special codes:
Lead Developer: @Taymastar 
Lead Programmer: @ChiefDaysRBLX @osedaycan
World Builder: @FamedChris & @TheGemini_II
3D Modeler: @Nic10Telf
